    public class Random
extends BasicStrategy
    A strategy that always guesses randomly.

    • Method Detail

      • guess

        public Code guess(Answer answer)
        Description copied from interface: IMastermindStrategy
        Return the next guess determined by the number of correct buttons on the correct positions and number of correct buttons on the wrong positions of the answer.
        Parameters:
        answer - Answer containing correct amount of buttons on correct positions and Correct amount of buttons on wrong positions
        Returns:
        Next guess

      • reset

        public Code reset()
        Description copied from class: BasicStrategy
        Reset the state of the strategy and return a good first guess. The reset method should be the same for every good strategy simply because there is not much to it. The only intelligent thing to do is to try a code whose first button is the same as the last pushed button in order to minimize the travel distance for the robot.
        Specified by:
        reset in interface IMastermindStrategy
        Overrides:
        reset in class BasicStrategy
        Returns:
        First guess
